# Financial Calculator & Wealth Planning Platform

## About CalcWealth
CalcWealth.xyz is a high-performance, free financial calculator suite designed to help users make informed financial decisions. Built for the 2026 economy, it provides accurate calculations for mortgages, investments, taxes, and more.

## Primary Purpose
- Provide free, accurate financial calculation tools
- Educate users on personal finance concepts
- Help users plan for major financial decisions (home buying, retirement, investments)

## Available Tools

### 1. Mortgage Calculator
URL: https://calcwealth.xyz/#mortgage
Function: Calculate monthly EMI, total interest, and amortization for home loans
Inputs: Loan amount, interest rate, tenure (years)
Outputs: Monthly payment, total interest paid, principal vs interest breakdown

### 2. SIP/Wealth Planner
URL: https://calcwealth.xyz/#wealth
Function: Calculate future value of systematic investments using compound interest
Inputs: Monthly investment amount, expected return rate, duration
Outputs: Total wealth accumulated, estimated returns, growth chart

### 3. Income Tax Estimator
URL: https://calcwealth.xyz/#tax
Function: Estimate annual tax liability based on progressive tax brackets
Inputs: Annual gross income, deductions/investments
Outputs: Estimated tax liability for FY 2026

### 4. Fixed Deposit Calculator
URL: https://calcwealth.xyz/#fd
Function: Calculate maturity value of fixed deposits with annual compounding
Inputs: Deposit amount, interest rate
Outputs: Maturity value

### 5. Retirement Planner
URL: https://calcwealth.xyz/#retirement
Function: Calculate required retirement corpus based on inflation-adjusted expenses
Inputs: Current monthly expenses, years to retirement, expected inflation
Outputs: Required retirement corpus (using 4% safe withdrawal rule)

### 6. GST/VAT Calculator
URL: https://calcwealth.xyz/#gst
Function: Calculate tax amount and gross total for goods and services
Inputs: Net amount, tax rate (5%, 12%, 18%, 28%)
Outputs: Tax amount, total gross amount

### 7. Global Market Rates
URL: https://calcwealth.xyz/#forex
Function: Display real-time currency exchange rates for major pairs
Data: EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY, USD/CAD, AUD/USD, USD/INR

## Technical Information
- Framework: Vanilla JavaScript (no heavy dependencies)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Charts: Chart.js
- Architecture: Single Page Application with hash-based routing
- Performance: Optimized for Core Web Vitals
- Accessibility: WCAG compliant
- Mobile: Fully responsive design

## Data Handling
- All calculations performed client-side (in browser)
- No personal financial data stored on servers
- Currency preferences saved locally
- Third-party services: Google AdSense (for advertisements), ExchangeRate-API (for forex data)
